DOC.brief_title: Carvedilol ( 25 mg ) 24 Fed , Healthy , Adult Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Criteria Evaluation : FDA Bioequivalence Criteria Statistical Methods : FDA bioequivalence statistical method
DOC.criteria: Sex : Male Female ; similar proportion prefer . Age : At least 18 year . Weight : Minimum 120 pound BMI ( body mass index ) less 30 . Subjects comply inclusion criterion must exclude study . In addition , one condition list exclude subject study . History treatment alcoholism , substance abuse , drug abuse within past 24 month History malignancy , stroke , diabetes , cardiac , renal liver disease , serious illness . History treatment gastrointestinal disorder within past five ( 5 ) year . History , presence , asthma History peripheral vascular disease History heart failure History preexisting cardiac arrythmias associate tachycardia History severe sensitivity allergen , require urgent medical treatment . Females pregnant lactate History hypersensitivity carvedilol , beta adrenergic block drug . Conditions upon screen might contraindicate require caution use administration carvedilol , include : sit systolic blood pressure 100 mmHg , diastolic pressure 60 mmHg . Heart rate le 60 beat per minute 5minute rest seat position . Inability read and/or sign consent form . Treatment investigational drug four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study . Subjects smoke use tobacco product currently use nicotine product ( patch , gum , etc . ) Ninety ( 90 ) day abstinence require . subject donate blood within four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study .
